channel.title: squid on Council of Elrond
channel.description: Recent content in squid on Council of Elrond

item.title: squid_setup
item.description: 1. yum -y update 2. yum install openssl 3. yum install squid 4. vim /etc/squid/squid.conf 5. tail -f /var/log/squid/access.log 6. systemctl start squid 7. systemctl status squid 8. ss -nlp | grep squid | grep 3128 dns_nameservers 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4
